title: In lobby "dont worry i main yas i will carry"

replies.body: https://i.imgur.com/9DYtFih.png

https://i.giphy.com/media/asHT7eh4AwG9G/giphy.gif
Is that a improperly formatted imgur image I see?
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Bs7L5aFCQAAGinq.jpg
https://i.imgur.com/9DYtFih.jpg?noredirect
The saver cobra
Any Yas telling you not to worry is going to worry you.

Pretty sure there should be a law where that's not allowed.

A Yasuo can't be allowed to tell you not to worry.

Someone irritating you can't be allowed to tell you to calm down.

Someone ruining your promos can't be allowed to say "It's fine".

Stuff like that.
I like how you think{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
but what if yas has M7?
Most mastery 7 Yasuo players have just been 5-star chefs in my experience.
http://i.imgur.com/CNJoSNT.png?noredirect
**NANI?!**

I always trust a m6 over a m7. Mastery 5 means you just fed a _lot_ of games on that champion. Mastery 7 means you just abused a stupid trick to get good score.

Mastery 6 means you probably knew what you were doing.

I use Op.GG. 

Mastery could mean you're great at them, or it could mean you just had a few good games out of many. Or, the more likely option, it doesn't mean anything. Hell, I've got Mastery tokens on Kayle just from ARAM spamming her to me for some reason. All I do is press E and a click after someone engages, I don't know shit about the champ.

This is also why I generally ignore the "1,000,000 Mastery points X CHAMP, LET ME TELL YOU WHY XYZ" threads. Cool, you play the champ a lot, doesn't mean you're good at them.  Look them up on Op.GG, 700 games played, 28% win rate. So. Much. Knowledge.

You can't get mastery tokens from ARAMs though...
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

I don't trust OP.GG, or _any_ sites that give player info, for that matter. They took almost a year to realize I had hit level 30, and was in _ranked_. And half of them want to give my computer AIDS, anyways.

Before you ask, yes, I did hit refresh. A lot of times.
Sound like you're just an idiot.
How am I an idiot for not trusting something that's been wrong before?

It was most definately only a single site. Your an idiot for many reasons. One being that you think a site gave your pc aids when clearly your the one operating and controlling it so therefore YOU gave it aids.

When you get perma'd so you flame on boards now ^^^^^^^^^^ lmao op.gg is a good site if you want info, not if you want accurate info. nothing on there is correct in regards to me or any of my friends accounts lmao. It used to be good but its very inaccurate this season. I know you're on the internet so there are no real conciquences, doesn't mean you need to be a friggin dink.

so you are not silver 5 in solo/duo with 94 Lp and in nocturnes mercenaries?
so you are not gold 5 in flex queue with 18 Lp and in karmas warriors?
so you are not bronze 1 in flex 3v3 with  0 Lp and in galios rageborn?

the sites pretty damn accurate to be honest. very rarely does it make that big of a mistake unless you took the name of someone who was pre registered on the boards under that name.
Sorry, the things you dont need to leave the league of legends client for are accurate. None of the winrates/games played are though m8, at least not on my browser
You can have loads of knowledge on a champ without being good. Good builds and setups are discovered more or less from the so called "low" elo players, that high elos adopt and get credit for.

Then he will probably still feed, but every death will be followed up by a Mastery 7 emote flare and an angry all chat messege on how the enemy champion  is "broken and takes zero skill".
Also. he will have PROJECT Yasuo equipped.

Based on true stories.

http://www.auplod.com/u/dpoula9d885.png

Ha jokes on you!

https://imgur.com/a/VSbVW
https://imgur.com/a/vHPQZ
https://imgur.com/a/SlTUo
~~nevermind that i own all project skin with the exception of 2 of them not being first strike~~
I just ban Yas. ;)
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/236/841/075.jpg
Even if someone in your lobby wants to play him?
that's why they let people ban pick intended, cause they grief their teammates themselves
Proof Riot is toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot UltraCombo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HlhYVi0Y,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2017-09-30T04:33:48.966+0000)
>
> I just ban Yas. ;)

Ayyyyy

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot UltraCombo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HlhYVi0Y,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2017-09-30T04:33:48.966+0000)
>
> I just ban Yas. ;)

I would but now I have to ban Cho'Gath smh

What if you make it impossible to ban pick intends of your teammates? You shouldn't ever really do it anyways.
(Still make you able to ban **your own** pick intend, because I sometimes click too early on the champ I want to ban.)
that would just be retarded. i didn't ban yasuo this one time because someone in my team was gonna play him. He switched to GP fed his ass off and the enemy team had a fed yasuo.
Okay, I suppose this one anecdote outweighs the thousands of trolls banning their team's champs, trying to make them role swap or dodge.

yeah cuz clearly that never ever happens otherwise.  I gave you an example as to why it's bad.

if you're last pick and want yasuo, though luck you shoulda expected he'd get banned anyway.

There's a difference between griefing and just not wanting a certain champ in your game. surprise: most people don't want yasuo in their game.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot UltraCombo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HlhYVi0Y,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2017-09-30T04:33:48.966+0000)
>
> I just ban Yas. ;)

Do you imply that it's okay to ban yasuo when someone in your team hover it ?

Yasuo is the only time it's okay to ban a teammate's champ. Everyone knows that he feeds whenever he's on your team, and godlike on the opposing team. It's best just to not let him see the light of day.

"Don't come to top, I'll carry you." - 0/4/0 Teemo

"It's okay, we still have the teamfight." - 0/8/2 Amumu

"Don't initiate, I'm going to backdoor." - 1/8/2 Master Yi

"Late carry champ." - 3/5/1 Vayne

"No worries, we have the late game." - Games that are over by 19th minute
At least the Vayne is salvageable, the other ones are an immediate gg
Funny thing is that I had that score as a Vayne at one point during the game then once I got enough items I started to dominate the game later on even though I was behind initially.
"GG, AFK" - 15/1/0 Xin Zhao after diving in 1v5
Does this mean Scooby Doo is a Yasuo main?

Yeesss all the scooby doo memes

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

stopped maining yas so I can have friends.
It worked :D{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I mean, they've clearly picked {{champion:2}} {{champion:1}}  {{champion:21}} {{champion:62}} which may be weird comp with Yas. But they would be effective against {{champion:202}} .
Whenever I see Yas as a pick intent - I dodge. Don't even wait for the bans to finish. When the enemy team bans his champ he'll troll pick.

> [{quoted}](name=LesVitesses,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=HlhYVi0Y,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-09-29T22:50:53.999+0000)

Wise man is always right.
How dare their virtual avatars be ones that I don't prefer.
Stupid trash game ever. I was telling you the truth. You removed my content
